column2: justice is important and importance of upholding the law correctly should be always applied
column34:
Amber Heard lied.

For weeks we watched the defamation case between Amber Heard and Johnny Depp during which we listened to Amber lie about Domestic Abuse from Johnny Depp.  She provided no evidence she was ever physically abused by Johnny. 
She made a mockery out of the real victims of domestic abuse and should be held accountable for those actions just as any non-celebrity person would.

For most of us, perjury is a crime and has the sentence of jail time.  This applies to Amber too.  
She should go to jail.

column2: Actions have consequences and she needs to realise she can`t just make shit up.
